function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Complex systems and uncertain environments can lead to unpredictable outcomes, including the propagation of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Unpredictable disease propagation can lead to widespread infection, illness, and potential loss of life.","Mitigation":"Enhance public health measures, implement strict hygiene protocols, and develop responsive healthcare systems.","Technologies":"Data analytics for disease tracking, AI for predictive modeling, and smart sensor technology for monitoring public health measures.","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations.","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, and healthcare organizations."}]}
